thread.title: The Internet’s Favorite ‘Hot Felon’ Is Out of Jail and Living a DREAM LIFE
thread.title_full: The Internet’s Favorite ‘Hot Felon’ Is Out of Jail and Living a DREAM LIFE

author: Mandy Kennedy
title: The Internet’s Favorite ‘Hot Felon’ Is Out of Jail and Living a DREAM LIFE
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 447 Shares You might not know the name "James Meeks," but you probably remember his photo. He made waves on the Internet after his very good-looking mugshot went viral. via: Instagram 
For most of us, we wouldn’t expect a career boost after going to jail, but it looks like that was the best thing that could have happened to Meeks’ life! Meeks is nine months out of prison and has a modeling contract. via: Instagram 
He landed the contract after his mugshot went viral, so he’s had a long time to prepare while in prison. Judging from his Instagram feed (link below) he really is as photogenic as his mugshot showed.
